alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:23PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Split Rock Creek near Corson. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the parking lot at the racetrack may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 PM CDT Saturday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Split Rock Creek Corson 8.5 9.0 Sat 10 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late Sunday night at 130 AM CDT.
